Room.Name: Tillie's Curio Shop
Room.LongDescription: Tillie will buy anything if she thinks she can turn a profit on it. Although she retired long ago, buying cheap and selling dear is in her blood, and she enjoys the exchange even though she doesn't need the money. A family picture on the wall shows Tillie with her two brothers, Toby and Trabin. It must have been taken a very long time ago.
